bike.description: Specialized E5, fully manipulated E5 SLX tubing, Designs for Women performance road compact design, FACT carbon seatstays with Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon fork, carbon fiber legs and crown, 7075 alloy threadless steerer, Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, alloy 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro, 3D forged alloy, 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Womens Comp handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8 clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon with 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano 105, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible, with brake lever extensions
Shimano 105, triple crankset, Hollowtech II 2-piece design
Composite body, alloy cage, with toe clips and straps
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Body Geometry Dolce Women's saddle, leather cover, Cr-Mo rails
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
